features: LOCK IN MOISTURE: The classic Dove Beauty Bar, with a delicate blush of color, nourishes and pampers skin to give you softer, smoother, more radiant looking skin than ordinary bar soap
EFFECTIVE CLEANSER: Gently wash away dirt and germs, for use every day on body, face, and hands. This Dove Beauty Bar soap creates a luxurious lather and won’t dry your skin like ordinary bar soaps
DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: Formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream, Dove moisturizing Beauty Bar and gentle skin cleanser leaves skin instantly soft and smooth with lasting nourishment
VERSATILE CLEANSER: The unique formulation for effective skin care can be enjoyed by the entire family as this all-in-one cleanser nourishes your face, body, and hands for beautiful skin
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This Beauty Bar is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and made with sulfate free cleansers, so you can feel good about switching from ordinary bar soap to Dove Beauty Bar
CARE WITH YOUR CLEANSER: Our mission is to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look, helping them raise their self-esteem
body.description: Dove Pink Beauty Bar combines a gentle cleansing formula with our signature 1/4 moisturizing cream to hydrate and nourish skin, instead of leaving skin feeling dry and tight like an ordinary bar soap might. It’s the classic Dove Beauty Bar formula with a delicate pink hue. Dove mild cleansers help skin retain its natural moisture, which helps keep skin hydrated, and Dove Beauty Bar even helps replenish skin-natural nutrients that can be lost during the cleansing process. Use your Beauty Bar as a facial cleanser or as a gentle skin cleanser for your body and hands. For best results, rub between wet hands and massage the smooth, creamy lather over your skin before rinsing thoroughly. The secret to beautiful skin is moisture, and no other bar hydrates skin better than Dove. Formulated with mild cleansers that care for skin as you cleanse, this moisturizing bar helps deliver nourishment and leave your face and body feeling soft and smooth and looking more radiant than ordinary soap does. Our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. Our mission is to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look, helping them raise their self-esteem and realize their full potential.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Pink Beauty Bar combines a gentle cleansing formula with our signature 1/4 moisturizing cream to hydrate and nourish skin, instead of leaving skin feeling dry and tight like an ordinary bar soap might.

Moisturizing Beauty Bar Unlike ordinary soap that dries your skin, Dove delivers a rich mix of gentle, nourishing ingredients for hydrated, healthy-looking skin. Trusted by Dermatologists This Beauty Bar with gentle cleansers helps your skin retain its natural moisture, leaving it feeling silky smooth and soft. Have You Tried Them All? There's a Dove Beauty Bar for everyone and every occasion. Try them all, and tell us which one is your favorite. Real Beauty is Cruelty-Free Dove is proud to be Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA - globally. Dove does not test on animals. Dove – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022.

Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash Dove Deep Moisture Shower Foam Dove Exfoliating Body Polish Crushed Macadamia & Rice Milk Main Benefit Enjoy softer, smoother skin after just one shower with this gentle, moisturizing body wash that leaves skin feeling cared for. It's a self-foaming body wash pump, providing the light skin feel you want for your skin needs. Restore your skin's nutrients and indulge in the rich texture for a beautifully creamy coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comparisons in my review. White Dove is more of a one size fits all.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love Dove's beauty bars. I used to use Olay, and I still like those too, but I felt like changing thing's up and had heard good things about Dove. We started with these White Dove bars, and then the pink coconut milk bars, and the cucumber bars. We really like all of them, honestly. I would say this White Dove is probably more of a one size fits all bar due to it not having any dye in it's color, and the scent being more mild. The pink coconut bar is pink in color and still has a light scent. It doesn't smell like the usual summer coconut smell sometimes associated with coconut smells, but more of a light milky floral coconut. This pink is probably my 2nd favorite, although it might be more of a tie with the pink and these White bars. The Cool cucumber bar is light green, has the strongest scent, and is definitely my personal favorite, (but because I am not sensitive to fragrances, and absolutely love it's scent). I love how fresh and cool it smells and feels, and enjoy the extra scent when showering.I actually think all of these Dove bars work the same when it comes to cleaning, moisturizing, and their overall quality, and they all make me feel clean and fresh, which I think is what most of us are looking for after a shower. I like the shape of these bars too, because they fit perfectly in your palm while washing and don't slip away easily when going over an uneven body part. For those of you who are sensitive to dyes or fragrances, and are looking for less of these things for any reason, I would recommend these White Dove bars. The White has the least fragrance of the 3 in my opinion, although it does still have a fresh smell, but is not overpowering, in my opinion. Dove also offers a Sensitive Dove bar if you're someone looking for even less of everything, but I have not personally tried those to compare.These Dove Beauty bars really feel great for your skin. My skin never feels tight and overly dry with these Dove bars like a lot of regular bar soaps do. I used to hate bar soaps growing up because of that feeling, and turned to body wash for years as an adult. After meeting my husband, and gaining weight and health problems after my second pregnancy and always feeling hot and sweaty, I didn't feel like body wash on a loofah was enough, at least not the small amount that used to suffice. He used bar soap, so I dredgingly gave it a try after swearing against it. Surprisingly I did feel cleaner, but again, I had that icky dry feeling. I researched and found Olay at the time, which is what I have been using since my daughter was born 9yrs ago. That is until about a year ago when we first switched to Dove.These are called beauty bars because they're made mostly of moisturizers, rather than "soap." That's why your skin feels clean AND SOFT after washing. If you still feel like you need a "soap" to get fully clean, I recommend keeping one of these in the shower to use after scrubbing with the soap bar, because this will help to remoisturize your skin and prevent that icky dry and weird tight feeling when using only bar soap. That will help make these last even longer too, but of course will cost you to keep both on hand. Of course, those soap bars are usually cheaper, so it will even out some. Olay is honestly just as good, and is also considered a beauty bar, but unfortunately it's harder to find them in these bigger ounce bars, so we will probably stick to Dove for awhile. Dove bars do seem to get used up a little faster, but we're enjoying the change for now, especially if we can continue finding them at a good value on here using the subscribe and save. I recommend you giving Dove a try if you want to feel clean while still leaving your skin feeling smooth when you step out of the shower. My whole family of 4 really likes all 3 of the ones we've used, and it's usually hard to please everyone in my household. I hope my experience and my pictures help give you an idea of what to expect in person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Experience Gentle Luxury with Dove Beauty Bar - A Moisturizing Skin Care Must-Have!
reviews.reviewText: The Dove Beauty Bar Gentle Skin Cleanser has become an indispensable part of my daily skincare routine, and I'm simply in love with its results! This pink beauty bar delivers a pampering and luxurious experience every time I use it. The gentle formulation works wonders on my skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and moisturized. Unlike harsh soaps that strip the skin of its natural oils, this beauty bar is incredibly nourishing and helps maintain the skin's natural moisture balance.One of the things I appreciate most about Dove Beauty Bar is its versatility. Not only does it cleanse effectively, but it also doubles as a moisturizing body bar. With just a single product, I can achieve gentle and soft skin care from head to toe. The subtle and pleasant fragrance adds a touch of luxury to my bathing experience, and the six bars in one pack ensure that I can enjoy this indulgence for a long time. If you're seeking a skin cleanser that offers a delicate, moisturizing touch to your skin care routine, Dove Beauty Bar Gentle Skin Cleanser is the ultimate choice. Embrace the luxury of soft, supple skin with this beauty bar that cares for you deeply, day after day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered soap from Amazon a couple of times and I seem to have an issue ordering the correct ounces. This is a great product and great for its price. The size is traditional and it is great moisturizer 100% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always My GO To
reviews.reviewText: Mild, creamy lathering body bar. Pleasant fragrant smell that is not overpowering. I’ve used Dove pink since I was a child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great mild soap. Personally like the scent. Love the price also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tired of dry skin and hair I searched soaps to match body ph. Dove was one of the best. My skin now feels less dry and itchy. My only 2 complaints are…1. The smell, however pleasant is just so strong, which is generally a good thing, you’ll have a nice smelling bathroom but I have a bird I worry about as they are respiratory sensitive.2. It tends to leave soap scum more than normal that I don’t get with other soaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This soft has a mild light smell which is so pleasant. Also it whitens the hands and reduces the look of aging. I love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great ! Leaves skin soft and clean
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and this works great on me! It always leaves my skin soft and clean! It is scented but the scent is not overwhelming at all while you're lathering up in the shower. And the price for this package was a good price saver compared to what I got at the store!

reviews.reviewTitle: Doves pink soap is affordable luxury
reviews.reviewText: I love the light scent and pink colour. This is an affordable luxury. Does not dry out skin. Pampering on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just perfect. Doesn't dry the skin.
Este producto lo pido porque es de importacion y de verdad nada que ver con las barras de jabon Dove que venden aca en mx.
Kenn die rosa dove aus USA und verwend sie schon mein ganzes Leben....Haut wird ganz weich und toller Duft......leider etwas teuerer als die klassische, aber wert!!!!
Le parfum de ses savons est délicieux et subtil. La couleur est belle ce qui est aussi un plus .Je les adores ,merci .
